title: Sharing the Nami stickers I have so far
body:
Brand new to doing art on the computer so I know I'm bad, but I like Nami enough to do it anyway :3 Have just these 4 so far since I started on the 30th. Enjoy, and feel free to use them however you want;

replies.body: Out of curiosity, why on the oce boards but not NA? Awesome though

Still loving the {{champion:90}} one the most since he is like my #1 champion that I enjoy playing.
https://i.gyazo.com/1879ddad395eac2137cba238079be701.png

Seriously keep up the with the funny stickers. Hilarious and well done!
https://i.gyazo.com/4b0f3bcb874bbb7a4a886fdeff5577c8.png (Yes I did just used your {{champion:53}} sticker)
Edit: Added Nami pride and reeeee!
The new nami icon reminded me of your nami pictures. Heavily the heart one, just with a rotation and no hearts.
Speaking of the icon, I completely forgot to participate on my OCE account D:

I would very much love a Shyvana sticker if you're up for making one.

Thank you if you make it, and I can live without it if you don't.
I've got to be pretty interested to make one, so it's unlikely unless the idea really inspires me.
hey, hey, you there, yes you
